name: Multiple GNSS Support
summary: This feature enables the use of multiple satellite systems as a time synchronization

parameters.name: GnssInfo.gnssRecControlPath
parameters.description: The                                 attribute                                 shows whether a control path exists.

parameters.name: GnssInfo.gnssReceiverControl
parameters.description: The                                 attribute                                 shows whether a Baseband Radio Node is in control of the GNSS                                 receiver unit.

parameters.name: GnssInfo.satelliteInformation
parameters.description: The attribute shows the satellites in view.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4040019 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4040019 MO instance.
